CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further fine - tuning of the LUMO and HOMO levels of the polymer by structural modification may improve V OC and promote the utilization of more NIR light by the lower bandgap materials .

Let's think step by step.

1. LUMO: Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital
3. NIR: Near-Infrared (light)

These are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. LUMO and HOMO are energy levels in a material related to its electronic structure, and NIR is a type of light with longer wavelengths.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. LUMO: Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital

These are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. I have removed NIR (Near-Infrared light) as it is a type of light and not a material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further fine - tuning of the LUMO and HOMO levels of the polymer by structural modification may improve V OC and promote the utilization of more NIR light by the lower bandgap materials .

Let's think step by step.

1. LUMO: Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital
3. V OC: Open-Circuit Voltage

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They refer to specific energy levels in a polymer (LUMO and HOMO) and a key parameter in solar cells (V OC).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. LUMO: Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital
3. V OC: Open-Circuit Voltage

These are the "Material Property" entities in the given paragraph. They refer to specific energy levels in a polymer (LUMO and HOMO) and a key parameter in solar cells (V OC), which are all related to the properties of materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| LUMO |
| HOMO |
| V OC |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further fine - tuning of the LUMO and HOMO levels of the polymer by structural modification may improve V OC and promote the utilization of more NIR light by the lower bandgap materials .

Let's think step by step.

1. "V OC" is a "Property Value" entity in the given paragraph. Voc, or open-circuit voltage, is a property used to describe the maximum voltage that can be generated by a solar cell.
2. "the lower bandgap materials" can also be considered a "Property Value" entity. The bandgap is a property of a material that describes the energy difference between the valence band and the conduction band. In this case, the bandgap is described as "lower," which is a value of this property.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. V OC
2. lower bandgap materials (specifically, the "lower" value of the bandgap property)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| V OC |
| lower bandgap materials |
